description: This Java class, PdfService, provides functionality to render invoice data into a PDF document using the OpenHTMLtoPDF library. It includes methods for building HTML content from invoice data, styling the document, and generating the PDF output as a byte array.

classes.name: PdfService
classes.description: Service class for rendering invoice HTML into a PDF document

methods.name: renderInvoice
methods.description: Converts an Invoice object into a styled PDF byte array. Uses HTML building and PDF rendering library.

methods.name: css
methods.description: Provides CSS styles for the PDF invoice layout.

methods.name: buildHtml
methods.description: Constructs the complete HTML content for the invoice, including dynamic data from the Invoice object.

methods.name: escape
methods.description: Escapes special HTML characters in string inputs for safe HTML rendering.
